# addingProduct(_:_:)

**Instance Method**

Returns the result of adding the product of the two given values to this value, computed without intermediate rounding.

## Declaration

```swift
func addingProduct(_ lhs: Self, _ rhs: Self) -> Self
```

## Parameters

- **lhs**: One of the values to multiply before adding to this value.
- **rhs**: The other value to multiply.

## Return Value

The product of `lhs` and `rhs`, added to this value.

## Discussion

This method is equivalent to the C `fma` function and implements the `fusedMultiplyAdd` operation defined by the [http://ieeexplore.ieee.org/servlet/opac?punumber=4610933].
title: addingProduct(_:_:)
